name: Wandering Fire
description:
The Light is something that will not let your fire go out. Take control in your hands and use intuition, that's all you need in a fight against darkness. With every second you will have less and less time searching for energy - fireflies that will replenish your supply of the light.

Be cautious, since darkness will not wait. Over time, it will begin to hunt you, in hope to devour your light. Therefore, there is very important mission in your responsibility - maintain the light in this dark world!
